Yes, sure! Sumela Monastery is located in the Macka district of Trabzon province in Turkey. Trabzon city is the nearest major city and is around an hour away by car. Here are some tips for getting to Sumela Monastery from nearby cities:

1. From Trabzon: The easiest way to get to Sumela Monastery is by car, either renting one or taking a taxi. You can also take a minibus or dolmus from the central city bus station to Macka, which is a town close to Sumela Monastery. From Macka, you can hire a taxi or take a minibus to the monastery. 2. From Rize: Sumela Monastery is around a 2-hour drive from Rize. You can rent a car or take a taxi to Sumela Monastery. Alternatively, you can take a bus from central Rize to Macka, from where you can take a minibus or hire a taxi to the monastery. 3. From Giresun: Sumela Monastery is about a 3-hour drive from Giresun. You can rent a car or take a taxi to Sumela Monastery. Additionally, there are buses that run between Giresun and Trabzon, although the journey may take slightly longer. 4. From Istanbul: Istanbul is about 10-11 hours away from Sumela Monastery by car. You can fly to Trabzon or take a bus from Istanbul to Trabzon. From Trabzon, you can take a taxi or minibus to Sumela Monastery. I hope this information helps you plan your trip to Sumela Monastery!
